title: New Skin Concepts
body: {{sticker:zombie-brand-mindblown}} Riot. You guys are making an amazing effort on new Chroma Skin Packs. But, you should make some new Chromas with champions: {{champion:92}} , {{champion:222}} ,{{champion:136}} or Even {{champion:17}} ! i'm just joking. But just add new champion Chromas to our LoL Dream Skins Bucket List.... idk i'm just giving you a heads up for what i think...... lmao but Thanks for the great effort...........
